title: Meta’s AI glasses can now help you hear conversations better
description: Conversation focus uses the AI glasses' open-ear speakers to amplify the voice of the person you're talking to, says Meta.
content: Conversation focus uses the AI glasses' open-ear speakers to amplify the voice of the person you're talking to, says Meta.
